original_text: Neither shall they shave their heads, nor suffer their locks to grow long; they shall only poll their heads.
korean_text: 그들은 또 머리털을 밀지도 말며 머리털을 길게 자라게도 말고 그 머리털을 깎기만 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: Neither shall they shave their heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기들의 머리를 깎지 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: nor suffer their locks to grow long
sentences.korean_translation: 머리털이 길게 자라도록 두지 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: they shall only poll their heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다만 머리를 깎아야 할 것이다
